data.name: Welcome To... Chichester 3 : Whatever happened to Coraline ?
data.detailed_description:
Arriving back to the US, you have a promise to keep to Cindi : Find out what happened to Coraline.

IMPORTANT NOTE :

This DLC will ONLY come into affect during the LAST pass of the "Chichester" section of the game, and ONLY if one of a given number of options are chosen at the appropriate time.
data.about_the_game:
Arriving back to the US, you have a promise to keep to Cindi : Find out what happened to Coraline.

IMPORTANT NOTE :

data.short_description: Arriving back to the US, you have a promise to keep to Cindi : Find out what happened to Coraline.

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 3 : The Demon Of Chichester And The Last Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or later
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
